Class SoundboardController

      • getInstance

        public static SoundboardController getInstance()
        Returns an instance of SoundboardController

      • setSampleDefaultName

        public void setSampleDefaultName(java.lang.String dName)
        Controller method for setting default Soundboard.Sample name
        Parameters:
        dName - - name in String format

      • playSample

        public void playSample(int index)
        Uses Soundboard to play Sample with given index.
        If audio is already playing, calls Soundboard to stop sample.
        Parameters:
        index - - index of the Sample

      • playSampleInstantly

        public void playSampleInstantly(int index)
        Uses Soundboard to play Sample with given index.
        Plays audio instantly, closing already playing sample in the process .
        Parameters:
        index - - index of the Sample

      • addSample

        public int addSample(java.lang.String filepath)
        Controller method for adding samples to the Soundboard
        Parameters:
        filepath - for audio file
        Returns:
        index of the added sample

      • removeSample

        public Soundboard.Sample removeSample(int index)
        Controller method for removing samples
        Parameters:
        index - - index of the sample
        Returns:
        if successful, returns removed sample, otherwise returns null

      • editSample

        public java.lang.Boolean editSample(int index,
                                    java.lang.String input,
                                    SoundboardController.INPUT_TYPE type)
        Edits the sample with given index.
        Depending on input type, changes the samples filepath or name
        Parameters:
        index - - index of the sample.
        input - - either name or filepath for the sample
        type - - type of the given string input. Either SAMPLE_NAME or FILEPATH
        Returns:
        Returns true if operation is successful, otherwise returns false.

      • compareSamples

        public java.lang.Boolean compareSamples(int index,
                                        java.lang.String input,
                                        SoundboardController.INPUT_TYPE type)
        Compares Sample with given index and input
        INPUT_TYPE determines compare type
        INPUT_TYPE.FILEPATH or INPUT_TYPE.SAMPLE_NAME
        Parameters:
        index - - index of the target sample
        input - - input in string form
        type - - determines compare operation
        Returns:
        returns true if the sample and input match

      • getSampleName

        public java.lang.String getSampleName(int index)
        Gets the sample name with given index
        Parameters:
        index - - index of the sample
        Returns:
        returns sample name if it exists, otherwise returns null

      • clearSampleArray

        public void clearSampleArray()
        Clears sampledata.txt and Soundboard.sampleArray

      • saveSampleData

        public void saveSampleData()
        Writes all Soundboard.sampleArray contents to sampledata.txt

      • initializeSoundboard

        public int initializeSoundboard()
        Reads all data from sampledata.txt and inserts valid samples to Soundboard.sampleArray

      • setListener

        public void setListener(javax.sound.sampled.LineListener listener)
        Sets a LineListener to Soundboard
        Parameters:
        listener - - a LineListener object
